title: Sticky barbecue spare ribs
ingredients: ['2 to 3 tablespoons honey', '1 1/2 tablespoons fish sauce', '1 tablespoon tomato puree', '1 tablespoon coarse grain mustard', '1 teaspoon five spice', 'chilli powder, to taste (optional)', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '750g pork spare ribs', '4 cloves garlic', '6 fresh sage leaves or 1/2 teaspoon dried sage']
